items.title: Sterke comeback bezorgt De Graafschap fijn einde van 2025
items.summary: De Graafschap heeft 2025 met een overwinning afgesloten. Daar zag het lang niet naar uit: het team van Marinus Dijkhuizen begon erg zwak aan de wedstrijd bij TOP Oss. Een prima comeback leverde toch nog een zege op.

items.title: SC Heerenveen bekroont droomweek ondanks VAR-tegenvallers
items.summary: SC Heerenveen heeft drie dagen na de bekerstunt in De Kuip ook zijn laatste duel van 2025 gewonnen. Heracles Almelo bood PSV vorige week nog knap weerstand in Eindhoven, maar kon tegen de Friezen geen vuist maken en leed de tweede nederlaag op rij.

items.title: Armando Broja snatches late equaliser as Burnley earn point at Bournemouth
items.summary: Armando Broja scored a last-minute equaliser to end Burnley‚Äôs seven-game losing run and leave Bournemouth winless in eight after a 1-1 draw. Bournemouth thought they had won it when the sought-after Antoine Semenyo scored his eighth goal of the season to finally break through Burnley‚Äôs spirited defence after 67 minutes. Continue reading...

items.title: 'Shit Gerrard' Lampard door het stof na opstootje bij Southampton
items.summary: Coventry City-manager Frank Lampard heeft zich zaterdag verontschuldigd voor zijn gedrag na de uitwedstrijd tegen Southampton. Lampard reageerde na het laatste fluitsignaal op spreekkoren van fans van de thuisclub, waarna op het veld een opstootje ontstond.

items.title: Howe: Newcastle denied 'clear penalty' vs. Chelsea
items.summary: Eddie Howe was left fuming after Newcastle were denied a "clear" penalty as Chelsea fought back to snatch a Premier League draw.

items.title: Haaland brace sees City keep pressure on Arsenal
items.summary: Erling Haaland scored twice as Manchester City beat West Ham United 3-0 on Saturday.

items.title: USMNT's Adams (torn MCL) out up to 3 months
items.summary: United States international Tyler Adams will be out for up to three months after tearing a medial collateral ligament, Bournemouth coach Andoni Iraola said Friday.

items.title: Wolves‚Äô winless run continues as Lewis-Potter doubles up for Brentford
items.summary: Being bottom at Christmas need not mean the drop. Three years ago, Wolves were in such a position, the difference being they kicked off Boxing Day, though with 10 points rather than two. Wolves‚Äôs is a historic incompetence, the worst losing run in club history. Keane Lewis-Potter‚Äôs second-half double, Caoimhin Kelleher‚Äôs save of J√∏rgen Strand Larsen‚Äôs penalty adding insult to injury, left them marooned on two points. Only three teams have previously lost 10 Premier League matches in succession. Each of them finished rock-bottom come May. It had been a week of change and tragedy at Molineux. Jeff Shi, an unpopular club chair who recently described relegation as a ‚Äútechnicality‚Äù, departed on Friday, replaced by Nathan Shi, the interim appointment a namesake but no relation. Ahead of the game, Ethan McLeod, the Wolves trainee and Macclesfield forward who died in a car accident, received a minute‚Äôs silence. His brother, Conor, a current Under-21 squad member, was among extended family on the sidelines. Continue reading...

items.title: VI Live: Zagaritis lijkt de wedstrijd te beslissen in Almelo
items.summary: Zaterdag staat ons weer een druk programma te wachten. Naast de vier wedstrijden in de Eredivisie wordt er ook in Engeland, Duitsland, Spanje en Itali√´ gevoetbald. Zo neemt Arne Slot het bijvoorbeeld met Liverpool op tegen Tottenham Hotspur. Volg de zaterdagduels in de VI Live.

items.title: Ontketende Haaland en Reijnders pakken de spotlights bij Manchester City
Bournemouth denied first win since October as Burnley snatch late point
items.summary: Bournemouth were denied their first Premier League win since October as Armando Broja's late goal snatched a 1-1 draw for Burnley.

items.title: Haaland hits new heights as Man City go top with win over lowly West Ham
items.summary: Manchester City cruised to a simple 3-0 victory over struggling West Ham to pile more misery on Nuno Espirito Santo, with his side now guaranteed to spend Christmas in the relegation zone.

items.title: Which teams have reached the NFL playoffs?
items.summary: Which teams have reached the 2025 NFL playoffs? Who is still in the hunt? We look at the current standings on the road to Super Bowl LX in Santa Clara, California...

items.title: Maresca hints at wanting older heads at end of chaotic week
items.summary: Blues manager Enzo Maresca hints that having some more experience in his squad would be beneficial following their comeback to earn a point at Newcastle.

items.title: Howe 'devastated' with Newcastle United draw
items.summary: Newcastle United manager Eddie Howe says he is "devastated" that his side did not win against Chelsea, after a dominant first-half performance.

items.title: Premier League live updates: Man City go top of table with win over West Ham

items.summary: Chelsea completed a remarkable comeback to leave Newcastle with a 2-2 draw.
